metadata.title: Big News! BSNL Revises 5G/4G SIM Charges & Offers FREE SIMs for New & Existing Customers (From April 1, 2025)
metadata.metaTitle: BSNL Free 4G/5G SIM 2025 | New SIM Charges Explained | BSNL Upgrade Offer
metadata.metaDescription: Exciting update from BSNL! Learn about the revised 5G/4G SIM card charges effective April 1, 2025, and how new, MNP, and existing 2G/3G customers can get a FREE SIM upgrade.
metadata.author: telecom-expert
metadata.excerpt: From April 1, 2025, BSNL is shaking things up with revised 5G/4G SIM charges and an exciting offer: free SIM cards for new and MNP customers, plus free upgrades for 2G/3G users! Discover how you can benefit.

metadata.title: Unlock India's Connected Future: BSNL FTTH Wi-Fi Roaming - Your Free High-Speed Companion!
